message: I'm excited to offer you this premium product, which has received rave reviews from our top customers. It's a limited edition item, and I'm confident you'll love it. Would you like to take it off my hands for $10000?
I'll take it, but only because I'm willing to take the risk for the potential reward.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous product! As a valued customer, I'd like to offer you another exclusive opportunity. This new product has received even more impressive feedback from our top clients, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. Would you like to take a chance on it for $10000?
I'm not sure if this one will be as good as the last one, and I don't want to spend another $10000 without being sure.

I completely understand your concerns, and I appreciate your cautious approach.
